body:
I recently tried to install the `hoomd-blue` package on my arch machine. I got this error:

```
spack install hoomd-blue
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "hoomd-blue@2.1.6%gcc@7.2.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +cuda~doc+mpi arch=linux-arch-x86_64 /ppp75ox"
```

How do I find out what is conflicting with what?
title: spack install: spec conflict error message is vague.
